thread.title: REFILE-S.Korea c.bank chief says hard to be optimistic due to slow jobs growth

title: REFILE-S.Korea c.bank chief says hard to be optimistic due to slow jobs growth
text:
May 17, 2018 / 3:32 AM / Updated an hour ago CORRECTED-S.Korea c.bank chief says hard to be optimistic due to slow jobs growth Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Corrects day in second paragraph)
SEOUL, May 17 (Reuters) - South Korea’s central bank chief on Thursday said it was difficult to be optimistic about the economy as jobs growth remained tepid.
Governor Lee Ju-yeol was speaking at an inauguration ceremony of the Bank of Korea’s new board member Lim Ji-won, who began her four-year term on Thursday.
